name: The Ridgemere care home
description:
The story is about an elderly woman named Mary, now retired and spending her final days in the Ridgemere care/retirement home, she grows restless and longs for an escape. 

She wonders what lies behind the locked doors to the restricted area of the  Ridgemere building. One late night Mary awakens to a strange sound coming from behind those very same locked doors and is startled by a disturbing silhouette passing through them. Will she investigate? what will she find there? It's up to you to make the choices and unravel the meaning behind the mysterious events as they unfold.

This is a text based horror adventure story which contains some multiple choices and two different endings. It should take around 20 minutes to complete for reference.

I hope you enjoy :)

If you have any spare time, please fill in my feedback form below to let me know what you liked and did not like, all feedback is welcome!
